public String processURI(String u,
                         String overrideType)
                  throws CommentException
Description copied from interface: FilterCallback
Process a URI. If it cannot be turned into something sufficiently safe, then return null.

Specified by:

onBaseHref

public String onBaseHref(String baseHref)
Description copied from interface: FilterCallback
Process a base URI in the page. Not only is this filtered, it affects all relative uri's on the page.

Specified by:
onBaseHref in interface FilterCallback

onText

public void onText(String s,
                   String type)
Description copied from interface: FilterCallback
Process plain-text. Notification only; can't modify. Type can be null, or can correspond, for example to HTML tag name around text (for example: "title"). Note that the string will have been fed through the relevant decoder if necessary (e.g. HTMLDecoder). It must be re-encoded if it is sent out as text to a browser.

Specified by:
onText in interface FilterCallback

processForm

public String processForm(String method,
                          String action)
                   throws CommentException
Process a form. Current strategy: - Both POST and GET forms are allowed to / Anything that is hazardous should be protected through formPassword.

Specified by:
processForm in interface FilterCallback
Parameters:
method - The form sending method. Normally GET or POST.
action - The URI to send the form to.
Returns:
The new action URI, or null if the form is not allowed.
Throws:
CommentException - If the form element could not be parsed and the user should be told.
